org.jmeifert.camber.net

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jmeifert.camber.net.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Client handles client-side communication.

              int port,
              java.lang.String group,
              java.lang.String groupPassword,
              java.lang.String nickname)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Instantiates a Client.
        Parameters:
        hostname - The server hostname to connect to
        port - The server port to connect to
        group - The group name to join
        groupPassword - The group's password
        nickname - The user's nickname in the group
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the hostname or port is invalid
